text: Orak Island is an Aegean island in Turkey The island is in Gökova Gulf at .The longer dimension of the island (north to east direction) is . There is a light house on the island. It is a part of Bodrum ilçe (district) of Muğla Province.Map page There are olive grooves on the uninhabited island. The cape at the south coast is known as an ideal place for underwater sports.Coast quide () ==References== Category:Uninhabited islands of Turkey Category:Islands of Muğla Province Category:Aegean islands Category:Bodrum District Category:Islands of Turkey
title: Orak Island (Muğla)
